quoteText:
Changes and Updates to this Privacy Policy

From time to time, we may revise the Policy. To help you stay current of any changes, we note the date the Privacy Policy was last updated above
title: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.

tosdr.case: The service may change its terms at any time, but the user will receive notification of the changes.
tosdr.tldr:
Changes and Updates to this Privacy Policy
From time to time, we may revise the Policy. To help guests we note the date the Privacy Policy was last updated above. Registered Users are notified via email and web interface when material changes are made.
